data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3542682,"name":"Joseph","username":"Flood","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/f/bbe5ce/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-02-27T18:34:20.467Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eHello, we are having issues getting the command scheduler loop overrun to stop appearing when we run robot code on the roboRio. We don’t experience these issues in simulation and we believe it is due to memory issues and the java garbage collector. When we see the error, it says robot.periodic() is taking too long (up to 40-60ms) but adding up the subsystems it does not exceed 20ms. Any help/info/tips would be appreciated.
